name: AWS Security Token Service (STS)
short: A web service on AWS that provides temporary, limited-privilege credentials for AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) users or for users that you authenticate (federated users).
description: AWS Security Token Service (STS) is a web service that enables you to request temporary, limited-privilege credentials for AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) users or for users that you authenticate (federated users). This service enables you to manage access to your AWS resources in a secure manner. It is a key component of AWS' security infrastructure, allowing for secure token-based authentication and authorization for AWS services.
